name: @holisticon/nativescript-buildhelper
description: Basic NPM package for helping on automate releasing of NativeScript Apps

scripts.changelog:add: git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md'
scripts.release:pre: npm run build && npm run test
scripts.release:post: npm run changelog && npm run changelog:add
scripts.release:major: npm run release:pre && npm version major && npm run release:post && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm run version-and-push
scripts.release:minor: npm run release:pre && npm version minor && npm run release:post && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm run version-and-push
scripts.release:patch: npm run release:pre && npm version patch && npm run release:post && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm run version-and-push
scripts.merge-and-publish:pre: git checkout master && git merge develop
scripts.merge-and-publish: mv ../README.md .&& mv ../LICENSE . && npm publish && git reset --hard && git clean -f
scripts.merge-and-publish:post: git checkout master && git merge develop

author: Martin Reinhardt
